alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 10:42PM CDT until May 10 at 9:08PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Goliad and Karnes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Minor flooding of farmland occurs in lowest portions of the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 24.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 27.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 24.6 Tue 10 pm CD 20.9 15.8 14.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1045 AM CDT.
